  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BController
    Controller class should implement this.
    BView<M>
    This is an interface all views should have
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppController
    App Controller calls for methods of the AppFive model The methods includes getters and setters from various sub-models.
    AppControllerTest
    Created by jjdaz on 2016-03-13.
    AppFive
    This is the master model class for the books It includes methods for handling user profile and books.
    AppFiveApp
    The application class for the app.
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BModel<V extends BView>
    All model classes are inherited from this class.
